content.query:
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://pandemicdatalake.blob.core.windows.net/public/curated/covid-19/ecdc_cases/latest/ecdc_cases.csv',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    --FIRSTROW = 2
    ) AS [r]
WHERE [countries_and_territories] = 'Brazil' order by [deaths] DESC
